qas.question: Which era was marked by investigating the universe?
What type of science are making a calendar and finding cures for diseases a part of?
What is an example of skilled professionals?
What is an example of religious devotee?
What would the first scientists have been considered?

context: In <a0_0>Classical Antiquity<a0_0/>, the inquiry into the workings of the universe took place both in investigations aimed at such practical goals as establishing a reliable calendar or determining how to cure a variety of illnesses and in those abstract investigations known as <a1_0>natural philosophy<a1_0/>. The ancient people who are considered the first scientists may have thought of themselves as <a4_0>natural philosophers<a4_0/>, as practitioners of a skilled profession (for example, <a2_0>physicians<a2_0/>), or as followers of a religious tradition (for example, <a3_0>temple healers<a3_0/>).
